name: filsspw

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))

comment: A filter is a subset of the power set of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
